content: The King Shizong Memorial is an underground museum. There in Dongmen Square, when you go through the tunnel, read his achievements and see how his works benefit the country. The King Sejong Memorial Hall in Korea is not very large. It can be visited in tens of minutes. If friends who like this aspect can come and visit it, there are still more exhibits in it.

The Shizong King Memorial Museum is a memorial museum of the Royal King acting on behalf of the Royal King. Many memorials are very interesting. There are many items here. Some of the furniture and articles used by the King are still well preserved.

The King Sejong Memorial is an underground museum, just below the King Sejong Memorial. Adjacent to the Ferry Memorial and the US Embassy, several cafes around, the underground museum is free, there are many models of warships, and some interactive model making.
The Memorial Hall of King Shizong is very small. It mainly introduces the life of King Shizong and his deeds.
Emperor Shizong invented Korean characters, so his sculptures can be seen at the Guanghua Gate.

King Shizong Memorial Hall is located in Guanghua Gate Square, together with the statue of General Li Shunshen. Under his statue is his museum, which records some of his history of inventing Korean characters. It opens at 11:00 a.m. during the day and is free of charge.
This museum is about a famous person in Korea. There are many great stories about him.

The display in Shizong Museum is like an art gallery. All models are displayed in Korean and some Chinese characters, presumably to show the achievements of King Shizong - Korean characters.
